mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PER_REPORT_INFO ( REPORT_ID, QUERY_TIME, REPORT_TIME, QUERY_OPERATOR, QUERY_REASON, CHECK_CODE ) VALUES ( #{REPORT_ID}, #{QUERY_TIME}, #{REPORT_TIME}, #{QUERY_OPERATOR}, #{QUERY_REASON}, #{CHECK_CODE} )

INSERT INTO PER_BASIC ( REPORT_ID, CLIENT_NAME, CREDENTIALS_TYPE, CREDENTIALS_NO, CLIENT_SEX, CLIENT_BIRTHDAY, MARITAL_STATUS, PHONE_NUM, COMPANY_TEL, FAMILY_TEL, EDUCATION, DEGREE, MAILING_ADDRESS, RESIDENCE_ADDRESS ) VALUES ( #{REPORT_ID}, ENCRYPT_DEC(#{CLIENT_NAME}), #{CREDENTIALS_TYPE}, ENCRYPT_DEC(#{CREDENTIALS_NO}), #{CLIENT_SEX}, ENCRYPT_DEC(#{CLIENT_BIRTHDAY}), #{MARITAL_STATUS}, ENCRYPT_DEC(#{PHONE_NUM}), ENCRYPT_DEC(#{COMPANY_TEL}), ENCRYPT_DEC(#{FAMILY_TEL}), #{EDUCATION}, #{DEGREE}, ENCRYPT_DEC(#{MAILING_ADDRESS}), ENCRYPT_DEC(#{RESIDENCE_ADDRESS}) )

INSERT INTO PER_SPOU ( REPORT_ID, SPOU_NAME, SPOU_CREDENTIALS_TYPE, SPOU_CREDENTIALS_NO, SPOU_COMPANY, SPOU_TEL ) VALUES ( #{REPORT_ID}, ENCRYPT_DEC(#{SPOU_NAME}), #{SPOU_CREDENTIALS_TYPE}, ENCRYPT_DEC(#{SPOU_CREDENTIALS_NO}), ENCRYPT_DEC(#{SPOU_COMPANY}), ENCRYPT_DEC(#{SPOU_TEL}) )

INSERT INTO PER_LIVE ( REPORT_ID, SERIAL, RESIDENTIAL_ADDRESS, RESIDENTIAL_CONDITION, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{REPORT_ID}, #{SERIAL}, ENCRYPT_DEC(#{RESIDENTIAL_ADDRESS}), #{RESIDENTIAL_CONDITION}, #{UPDATE_TIME} )

INSERT INTO PER_CAREER ( REPORT_ID, SERIAL, COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_ADDRESS, CAREER, INDUSTRY, DUTIES, JOB_TITLE, ENTER_YEAR, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{REPORT_ID}, #{SERIAL}, ENCRYPT_DEC(#{COMPANY_NAME}), ENCRYPT_DEC(#{COMPANY_ADDRESS}), #{CAREER}, #{INDUSTRY}, #{DUTIES}, ENCRYPT_DEC(#{JOB_TITLE}), #{ENTER_YEAR}, #{UPDATE_TIME} )

INSERT INTO PER_ASSETS_DISPOSAL ( REPORT_ID, SERIAL, INFO_TYPE, COMPANY_NAME, RECEIVE_DATE, AGGREGATE_AMOUNT, LAST_REPAY_DATE, BALANCE ) VALUES ( #{REPORT_ID}, #{SERIAL}, #{INFO_TYPE}, #{COMPANY_NAME}, #{RECEIVE_DATE}, #{AGGREGATE_AMOUNT}, #{LAST_REPAY_DATE}, #{BALANCE} )

INSERT INTO PER_EXTERNAL_GUARANTEE_DETAIL ( REPORT_ID, SERIAL, LOAN_TYPE, LOAN_GRANT_ORG, LOAN_CONTRACT_SUM, LOAN_GRANT_DATE, LOAN_STOP_DATE, GUARANTEE_SUM, GUARANTEE_BALANCE, LOAN_FIVE_CALSS, SETTLE_ACCOUNT_DATE ) VALUES ( #{REPORT_ID}, #{SERIAL}, '0', #{LOAN_GRANT_ORG}, #{LOAN_CONTRACT_SUM}, #{LOAN_GRANT_DATE}, #{LOAN_STOP_DATE}, #{GUARANTEE_SUM}, #{GUARANTEE_BALANCE}, #{LOAN_FIVE_CALSS}, #{SETTLE_ACCOUNT_DATE} )

INSERT INTO PER_EXTERNAL_GUARANTEE_DETAIL ( REPORT_ID, SERIAL, LOAN_TYPE, LOAN_GRANT_ORG, LOAN_CONTRACT_SUM, LOAN_GRANT_DATE, GUARANTEE_SUM, GUARANTEE_BALANCE, SETTLE_ACCOUNT_DATE ) VALUES ( #{REPORT_ID}, #{SERIAL}, '1', #{LOAN_GRANT_ORG}, #{LOAN_CONTRACT_SUM}, #{LOAN_GRANT_DATE}, #{GUARANTEE_SUM}, #{GUARANTEE_BALANCE}, #{SETTLE_ACCOUNT_DATE} )

INSERT INTO PER_LOAN_DETAIL ( REPORT_ID, SERIAL_NUMBER, SERIAL, LOANS_DATE, LOANS_ORG, LOANS_AMOUNT, LOANS_USE, REPAY_NUM, REPAY_TYPE, EXPIRY_DATE, STOP_DATE, ACC_STATUS, FIVE_TYPE, PRINCIPAL_BALANCE, REST_REPAY_NUM, CUR_REPAY_AMOUT, PLAN_REPAY_DATE, ACTUAL_REPAY_AMOUT, LAST_REPAY_DATE, CUR_OVER_NUM, CUR_OVER_AMOUNT, T_N_REPAY_PRINCIPAL, S_N_REPAY_PRINCIPAL, N_N_REPAY_PRINCIPAL, L_N_REPAY_PRINCIPAL, REPAY_RECORD, BUSSID, VOUCHTYPE, CURRENCYTYPE, STATEBTIME, STATEETIME, OVERDUE_BDATE, OVERDUE_EDATE, SPECIAL_TRADE_TYPE, OCCUR_DATE, CHANGE_MONTH, OCCUR_SUM, OVERDUE_DETAIL ) VALUES ( #{REPORT_ID}, #{SERIAL_NUMBER}, #{SERIAL}, #{LOANS_DATE}, #{LOANS_ORG}, #{LOANS_AMOUNT}, #{LOANS_USE}, #{REPAY_NUM}, #{REPAY_TYPE}, #{EXPIRY_DATE}, #{STOP_DATE}, #{ACC_STATUS}, #{FIVE_TYPE}, #{PRINCIPAL_BALANCE}, #{REST_REPAY_NUM}, #{CUR_REPAY_AMOUT}, #{PLAN_REPAY_DATE}, #{ACTUAL_REPAY_AMOUT}, #{LAST_REPAY_DATE}, #{CUR_OVER_NUM}, #{CUR_OVER_AMOUNT}, #{T_N_REPAY_PRINCIPAL}, #{S_N_REPAY_PRINCIPAL}, #{N_N_REPAY_PRINCIPAL}, #{L_N_REPAY_PRINCIPAL}, #{REPAY_RECORD}, #{BUSSID}, #{VOUCHTYPE}, #{CURRENCYTYPE}, #{STATEBTIME}, #{STATEETIME}, #{OVERDUE_BDATE}, #{OVERDUE_EDATE}, #{SPECIAL_TRADE_TYPE}, #{OCCUR_DATE}, #{CHANGE_MONTH}, #{OCCUR_SUM}, #{OVERDUE_DETAIL} )

INSERT INTO PER_CREDIT_DETAIL ( REPORT_ID, SERIAL_NUMBER, SERIAL, CR_REL_CARD_DATE, CR_REL_CARD_ORG, CARDTYPE, CR_CREDIT_SUM, CR_SHARE_CREDIT_SUM, CR_STOP_DATE, CR_ACC_STATUS, CR_USED_SUM, CR_AVG_USED_SUM, CR_USED_MAX_SUM, CR_SHOULD_REPAY_AMOUT, CR_BILL_DATE, CR_ACTUAL_REPAY_AMOUT, CR_LAST_REPAY_DATE, CR_CUR_OVER_NUM, CR_CUR_OVER_AMOUT, CR_REPAY_RECORD, BUSSID, VOUCHTYPE, CURRENCYTYPE, STATEBTIME, STATEETIME, OVERDUE_BDATE, OVERDUE_EDATE, SPECIAL_TRADE_TYPE, OCCUR_DATE, CHANGE_MONTH, OCCUR_SUM, OVERDUE_DETAIL ) VALUES ( #{REPORT_ID}, #{SERIAL_NUMBER}, #{SERIAL}, #{CR_REL_CARD_DATE}, #{CR_REL_CARD_ORG}, #{CARDTYPE}, #{CR_CREDIT_SUM}, #{CR_SHARE_CREDIT_SUM}, #{CR_STOP_DATE}, #{CR_ACC_STATUS}, #{CR_USED_SUM}, #{CR_AVG_USED_SUM}, #{CR_USED_MAX_SUM}, #{CR_SHOULD_REPAY_AMOUT}, #{CR_BILL_DATE}, #{CR_ACTUAL_REPAY_AMOUT}, #{CR_LAST_REPAY_DATE}, #{CR_CUR_OVER_NUM}, #{CR_CUR_OVER_AMOUT}, #{CR_REPAY_RECORD}, #{BUSSID}, #{VOUCHTYPE}, #{CURRENCYTYPE}, #{STATEBTIME}, #{STATEETIME}, #{OVERDUE_BDATE}, #{OVERDUE_EDATE}, #{SPECIAL_TRADE_TYPE}, #{OCCUR_DATE}, #{CHANGE_MONTH}, #{OCCUR_SUM}, #{OVERDUE_DETAIL} )

INSERT INTO PER_Q_CREDIT_DETAIL ( REPORT_ID, SERIAL_NUMBER, SERIAL, Q_CR_REL_CARD_DATE, Q_CR_REL_CARD_ORG, CARDTYPE, Q_CR_CREDIT_SUM, Q_CR_SHARE_CREDIT_SUM, Q_CR_STOP_DATE, Q_CR_ACC_STATUS, Q_CR_USED_SUM, Q_CR_AVG_USED_SUM, Q_CR_USED_MAX_SUM, Q_CR_SHOULD_REPAY_AMOUT, Q_CR_BILL_DATE, Q_CR_ACTUAL_REPAY_AMOUT, Q_CR_LAST_REPAY_DATE, Q_CR_CUR_OVER_NUM, Q_CR_CUR_OVER_AMOUT, Q_CR_REPAY_RECORD, UNREPAY_BALANCE, BUSSID, VOUCHTYPE, CURRENCYTYPE, STATEBTIME, STATEETIME, OVERDUE_BDATE, OVERDUE_EDATE, SPECIAL_TRADE_TYPE, OCCUR_DATE, CHANGE_MONTH, OCCUR_SUM, OVERDUE_DETAIL ) VALUES ( #{REPORT_ID}, #{SERIAL_NUMBER}, #{SERIAL}, #{Q_CR_REL_CARD_DATE}, #{Q_CR_REL_CARD_ORG}, #{CARDTYPE}, #{Q_CR_CREDIT_SUM}, #{Q_CR_SHARE_CREDIT_SUM}, #{Q_CR_STOP_DATE}, #{Q_CR_ACC_STATUS}, #{Q_CR_USED_SUM}, #{Q_CR_AVG_USED_SUM}, #{Q_CR_USED_MAX_SUM}, #{Q_CR_SHOULD_REPAY_AMOUT}, #{Q_CR_BILL_DATE}, #{Q_CR_ACTUAL_REPAY_AMOUT}, #{Q_CR_LAST_REPAY_DATE}, #{Q_CR_CUR_OVER_NUM}, #{Q_CR_CUR_OVER_AMOUT}, #{Q_CR_REPAY_RECORD}, #{UNREPAY_BALANCE}, #{BUSSID}, #{VOUCHTYPE}, #{CURRENCYTYPE}, #{STATEBTIME}, #{STATEETIME}, #{OVERDUE_BDATE}, #{OVERDUE_EDATE}, #{SPECIAL_TRADE_TYPE}, #{OCCUR_DATE}, #{CHANGE_MONTH}, #{OCCUR_SUM}, #{OVERDUE_DETAIL} )

INSERT INTO PER_OVERDUE_SUMMARY ( REPORT_ID, SERIAL, SERIAL_NUMBER, CART_TYPE, OVER_MONTH, OVER_MONTH_NUM, OVER_SUM ) VALUES ( #{REPORT_ID}, #{SERIAL}, #{SERIAL_NUMBER}, #{CART_TYPE}, #{OVER_MONTH}, #{OVER_MONTH_NUM}, #{OVER_SUM} )

INSERT INTO PER_STATEMENT ( REPORT_ID, SERIAL, SERIAL_NUMBER, CART_TYPE, ORG_DES, ORG_DES_DATE, OWNER_DECLARE, OWNER_DECLARE_DATE, OBJECTIONS, OBJECTIONS_DATE ) VALUES ( #{REPORT_ID}, #{SERIAL}, #{SERIAL_NUMBER}, #{CART_TYPE}, #{ORG_DES}, #{ORG_DES_DATE}, #{OWNER_DECLARE}, #{OWNER_DECLARE_DATE}, #{OBJECTIONS}, #{OBJECTIONS_DATE} )

INSERT INTO PER_VERDICT ( REPORT_ID, SERIAL, TYPE, COURT_NAME, CAUSE, REGISTER_DATE, SETTLE_STYLE, RESULT, SETTLE_DATE, APPLY_SYM, APPLY_SYM_VALUE, GOAL_SYM, GOAL_SYM_SUM ) VALUES ( #{REPORT_ID}, #{SERIAL}, #{TYPE}, #{COURT_NAME}, #{CAUSE}, #{REGISTER_DATE}, #{SETTLE_STYLE}, #{RESULT}, #{SETTLE_DATE}, #{APPLY_SYM}, #{APPLY_SYM_VALUE}, #{GOAL_SYM}, #{GOAL_SYM_SUM} )

INSERT INTO PER_PROVIDENT_FUND_PAY ( REPORT_ID, SERIAL, PAY_PLACE, PAY_DATE, START_PAY_MON, STOP_PAY_MON, PAY_STATUS, PAY_MON_AMOUT, PER_PAY_PERCENT, COM_PAY_PERCENT, PAY_COM_NAME, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{REPORT_ID}, #{SERIAL}, #{PAY_PLACE}, #{PAY_DATE}, #{START_PAY_MON}, #{STOP_PAY_MON}, #{PAY_STATUS}, #{PAY_MON_AMOUT}, #{PER_PAY_PERCENT}, #{COM_PAY_PERCENT}, ENCRYPT_DEC(#{PAY_COM_NAME}), #{UPDATE_TIME} )

INSERT INTO PER_PENSIO_PAY ( REPORT_ID, SERIAL, INSURED_PLACE, INSURED_DATE, PAY_MON_SUM, START_WORK_MON, PAY_STATUS, PER_PAY_BASE, PAY_AMOUT_MON, UPDATE_TIME, PAY_COM_NAME, SOPT_PAY_REASON ) VALUES ( #{REPORT_ID}, #{SERIAL}, #{INSURED_PLACE}, #{INSURED_DATE}, #{PAY_MON_SUM}, #{START_WORK_MON}, #{PAY_STATUS}, #{PER_PAY_BASE}, #{PAY_AMOUT_MON}, #{UPDATE_TIME}, ENCRYPT_DEC(#{PAY_COM_NAME}), #{SOPT_PAY_REASON} )
